## ExtensionType enum

Defines the type of the extension.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum ExtensionType 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  Mark | <code>&quot;mark&quot;</code> | Identifies a MarkExtension |
|  Node | <code>&quot;node&quot;</code> | Identifies a NodeExtension. |
|  Plain | <code>&quot;plain&quot;</code> | Identifies a PlainExtension |
